original_text:
I will destine you to the sword,
    and all of you shall bow down to the slaughter,
because, when I called, you did not answer;
    when I spoke, you did not listen,
but you did what was evil in my eyes
    and chose what I did not delight in.”
korean_text: 내가 너희를 칼에 붙일 것인즉 다 구푸리고 죽임을 당하리니 이는 내가 불러도 너희가 대답하지 아니하며 내가 말하여도 듣지 아니하고 나의 눈에 악을 행하였으며 내가 즐겨하지 아니하는 일을 택하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: I will destine you to the sword
and all of you shall bow down to the slaughter
but you did what was evil in my eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 내 눈에 악한 것을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and chose what I did not delight in
